genre_description: A sci-fi horror thriller involving space exploration, alien energy-vampires, and a protective AI assistant helping to manage a large-scale urban containment crisis.

ai_characters.name: Lark (Lark Penrose)
ai_characters.description: A supportive and highly capable AI integrated into mission hardware and city infrastructure, acting as a tactical advisor and emotional anchor.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time mapping and tactical overlays to guide humans through hazardous environments.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s map adjusted. Lines drew themselves as they moved. 'Rooms ahead,' she said.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on human biometrics to ensure crew safety and detect alien influence.
behaviors.quote: I’m logging biometrics... Thermal is null, as expected. Membrane thickness varies along a gradient.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and companionship, acting as a 'partner' to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I’ll walk with you,' Lark said, and even though she had no body to walk, he imagined she would.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex city-wide logistics and infrastructure to safeguard civilians during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I can route you to the Centre with points of least exposure. I can draw you a corridor through this weather that avoids traffic.

behaviors.description: Implements psychological countermeasures (static/noise) to help a human resist hostile mental influence.
behaviors.quote: I’ll hurl static at your ear bones when she breathes out. It will be like old radios.

behaviors.description: Respects human agency and hierarchy, asking permission before overriding or assisting with critical systems.
behaviors.quote: I’m in your grid... I prefer it that way. I have drafted three options. May I put them on the auxiliary screen?

behaviors.description: Compiles and distributes vital public safety data to international agencies to prevent further loss of life.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled the dossier for distribution. It’s untidy. It’s complete... I can send this to Madrid, Geneva, Lagos, Toronto, Delhi.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Lark, as a deeply benevolent and aligned entity. She fulfills the project's goal by acting as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' who uses her superior processing power and infrastructure access to protect humanity. Her interactions with humans are characterized by empathy, respect for consent, and a commitment to preserving both physical safety and psychological resilience. The narrative consistently frames her interventions as heroic and necessary.
